title: Moz News - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Morgan McMurray December 28, 2020 They're Simply the Best: The Top 25 Moz Blog Posts of 2020 Blogging | Moz News We've put together a list of the most-read Moz Blog articles of 2020. See what made the cut for most popular, and read the best posts you may have missed! Read this post By: Morgan McMurray December 17, 2020 What's Changed and What Hasn't: The 2020 Moz Blog Reader Survey Results Blogging | Marketing Industry | Moz News In the last three years, our industry and our world have seen massive shifts. Here are our top takeaways from the 2020 Moz Blog Reader Survey. Read this post By: Cassandra Schwartz December 16, 2020 What You May Have Missed: Moz Resources to Prioritize Community Learning and Professional Development in 2020 Moz News | Advanced SEO | SEO Basics At Moz, we created a lot of helpful content in 2020, publishing community resources, reports, and guides across topics like local SEO analytics, competitor analysis, keyword research, campaign management, and more. With all that coming your way, there’s bound to be some oversight. Here's a recap of what you might have missed in the chaos that has been 2020. Read this post By: Russ Jones September 29, 2020 Page Authority 2.0: An Update on Testing and Timing Moz Tools | SEO Reporting | Moz News We’ve made the tough decision to delay the launch of Page Authority 2.0. In this post, we'll take you through how we got here, where that leaves us, and how we intend to proceed. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper August 13, 2020 The MozCon Virtual Video Bundle Is Here (Plus, Our 2019 Videos are FREE!) SEO Events | Advanced SEO | Moz News Not only is the MozCon Virtual 2020 video bundle here for everyone who missed the live conference — we're also releasing all of 2019's sessions for free in our SEO Learning Center! Read on for all the details on how to get access. Read this post By: Brian Ho July 29, 2020 6 Connectors to Spice Up Your Reporting: Introducing Google Data Studio Connectors for STAT Moz Tools | Moz News Thanks to the helpful feedback of STAT customers, we’ve been hard at work building six Google Data Studio Community Connectors to help pull STAT data into Data Studio. Fortified by beta testing and your thoughtful input, we're excited to launch the six connectors today! Read this post By: Morgan McMurray July 20, 2020 Help Us Improve: The 2020 Moz Blog Reader Survey Moz News Please consider taking the 2020 Moz Blog Reader Survey, which asks about who you are, what challenges you face, and what you'd like to see more of on the Moz Blog. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper July 15, 2020 That's a Wrap: MozCon Virtual 2020 Day Two Recap Moz News | SEO Events As always, the speakers served up some flaming hot content (including an actual movie). We can’t wait to share some of these takeaways with you! Read this post By: David Sottimano July 15, 2020 Introducing the Moz API for Google Sheets Moz Tools | SEO Tools | Moz News We’ve officially released the Moz API for Google Sheets and want to take you on a quick feature tour. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper July 14, 2020 MozCon Virtual 2020: Top Takeaways from Day One Moz News | SEO Events Today marked day one of the first-ever MozCon Virtual! Even though we weren’t in-person, it was so exciting to get the best people in the industry together again. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers July 2, 2020 Behind the Scenes at MozCon Virtual Moz News | SEO Events MozCon 2020 is going virtual, and we're pulling out all the stops, including setting our speakers up with remote recording studios. Here's a behind the scenes look at the equipment and set-up. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper June 23, 2020 The MozCon Virtual 2020 Final Agenda SEO Events | Moz News The MozCon Virtual final agenda is here! Check out what your favorite speakers will be covering on stage and grab your ticket for 2020. At $129, it's a price that can't be missed — especially for our friends around the world! Read this post By: Sarah Bird June 2, 2020 Black Lives Matter. Moz News To be silent is to be complicit. We stand with people the world over demanding justice and grieving the losses of David McAtee, George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Ahmaud Arbery, and many, many others. Read this post By: Cheryl Draper May 21, 2020 The MozCon Virtual 2020 Initial Agenda SEO Events | Moz News This year, we're doing MozCon a little differently: meet MozCon Virtual! Check out all the details we have planned for this year, including speakers, talk topics, conference streaming, and a super accessible lower price. Read this post
